headline: How The Narrative Around Freeport McMoRan (FCX) Is Shifting With New Copper And Grasberg Assumptions
summary: Freeport McMoRan’s updated fair value target has shifted from US$48.52 to US$64.02, reflecting refreshed expectations around what its shares could be worth as new information filters into analyst models. The small change in the discount rate assumption from 8.45% to 8.38% and the higher dollar revenue growth outlook of 10.36% versus 7.85% are closely tied to recent Street research that folds in current copper pricing and progress at Grasberg. As you read on, keep an eye on how these evolving...

headline: Freeport MOU Extends Grasberg Rights And Refocuses Long Term Copper Story
summary: Freeport McMoRan (NYSE:FCX) has signed a Memorandum of Understanding with the Indonesian government to extend operating rights for PT Freeport Indonesia in the Grasberg minerals district. The MOU covers amendments to mining licenses, expanded community support and exploration, a stronger focus on domestic downstream processing, and a future share transfer to Indonesia. The agreement is intended to secure Freeport McMoRan's long term presence at one of the world's key copper and gold...

headline: Leverage Shares by Themes Expands 2X Single-Stock ETF Lineup with Targeted Exposure to American Express and Freeport
summary: GREENWICH, Conn., Feb. 19, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Leverage Shares by Themes is pleased to announce the launch of two new 2X single-stock leveraged ETFs, available for trading beginning February 19, 2026. Built for active traders seeking dynamic ways to engage with potentially high-growth innovators, these products are designed with the goal of helping investors amplify returns (up & down) while actively participating in the daily performance of American Express and Freeport-McMoRan. headline: A Look At Freeport McMoRan (FCX) Valuation After A Strong Three Month Share Price Run
summary: Freeport-McMoRan stock overview after recent performance Freeport-McMoRan (FCX) has drawn fresh attention after a strong run over the past 3 months, with the stock showing a return of about 58% and a 1 year total return above 64%. At a last close of US$62.55, the US based copper and gold producer reports annual revenue of about US$25.9b and net income of roughly US$2.2b, providing investors with clear headline scale for assessment. headline: FCX Announces Agreement for Life of Resource Extension of Operating Rights in Grasberg Minerals District
summary: PHOENIX, February 19, 2026--Freeport (NYSE: FCX) announced today that it has entered into a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with the Indonesia government for a life of resource extension of operating rights for PT Freeport Indonesia (PTFI) in the Grasberg minerals district.
